name: HSC GREEN BOOT BADGE for the Round of 16 in 2022

metadata.name: HSC GREEN BOOT BADGE for the Round of 16 in 2022
metadata.description: This HYPER GREEN BOOT BADGE is awarded to the eligible holders of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 in celebration of the Round of 16 at the QATAR 2022 FIFA World Cup: Netherlands, Senegal, England, USA, France, Australia, Argentina, Poland, Morocco, Croatia, Japan, Spain, Portugal, Korea(South Korea), Brazil and Switzerland.
metadata.criteria: The badge is automatically awarded to the holders of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 NFT(s) with country property of Netherlands, Senegal, England, USA, France, Australia, Argentina, Poland, Morocco, Croatia, Japan, Spain, Portugal, Korea(South Korea), Brazil and Switzerland at the time of the last game of 2022 FIFA World Cup Group Matches.
metadata.evidence: The winner has been proved to be the holder of eligible Hyper Football Club - World 2022 NFT(s) at the time of the last game of 2022 FIFA World Cup Group Matches: Netherlands, Senegal, England, USA, France, Australia, Argentina, Poland, Morocco, Croatia, Japan, Spain, Portugal, Korea(South Korea), Brazil or Switzerland.
metadata.properties: {"Game Year":{"name":"Game Year","value":"2022 QATAR"},"Game Result":{"name":"Game Result","value":"Round of 16"}}
